br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.BaseScreen

  • Packages that use BaseScreen 
    Package Description
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles
    The core classes of the application, such as the desktop starter, the controller and the player profile.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.games
    Classes representing each battle of the game.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.object2d
    This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens
    The visual layer (interfaces).
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.rpg  
    br.edu.ifsp.pds.shadowstruggles.screens.utils
    Auxiliary classes for the interfaces.
